      • retrieveIssuerList

        void retrieveIssuerList()
        Deprecated. as of sdk version 6.4. Will be removed in sdk version 7.4
        Retrieve issuer list.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class with the error status codes. See ISecureCloudManagerService.retrieveIssuerList() for applicable error codes.
        See Also:
        ISecureCloudManagerFacade.retrieveIssuerList(), ISecureCloudManagerService.retrieveIssuerList()

      • retrieveIssuerApplicationURL

        void retrieveIssuerApplicationURL(int issuerIISN)
        Deprecated. as of sdk version 6.4. Will be removed in sdk version 7.4
        Retrieve issuer application URL.
        Parameters:
        issuerIISN - the issuer iisn
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - PaydiantException or an instance of a child PaydiantException class with the error status codes. See ISecureCloudManagerService.retrieveIssuerApplicationUrl(int issuerIISN) for applicable error codes.
        See Also:
        ISecureCloudManagerFacade.retrieveIssuerApplicationUrl(int issuerIISN), ISecureCloudManagerService.retrieveIssuerApplicationUrl(int issuerIISN)

      • setSecureCloudServiceListener

        void setSecureCloudServiceListener(ISecureCloudServiceListener secureCloudServiceListener)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the listener to handle secure cloud service callbacks.
        Parameters:
        secureCloudServiceListener - The ATM cash service listener. This can be either an implementation of ISecureCloudServiceListener or an extended instance of SecureCloudServiceListenerAdapter.
        See Also:
        ISecureCloudServiceListener, SecureCloudServiceListenerAdapter

      • removeListener

        void removeListener()
        Deprecated. 
        Removes the secure cloud service listener and sets it to null.
        Since:
        4.4.0.2
